question:
You work for an international company,and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.
write a letter to your manager.in your letter 
explain why you want to work in the companys hear office for six months
say how your work could be done while you are away
ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I hope this letter finds you well.

I am writing this letter to say that my request about switching my work for six months in its head job in another country and if you let me I want to discuss I am going to change my job for this time.

actually,I decided to go to the head office in another country because I have a lot of problems.For example, my wife has a dilemma mind and her doctor says to us the need to change the living environment for the better .

after that,when I go to the centre office I will help another co-worker for finding a solution if they have a complication and today by improving technology ,especially the Internet we can connect together very easy and fortunately our company have a network LAN. In addition, I would like help me for arranging it and let me will go to the company centre post, For this reason, I believe you can help me and I promise you we have no problem.
Hope to hear from you on the matter soon and thank you for your hard work and dedication.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the verb help should be in the to-infinitive form. Consider adding the word to.
